meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>warn</kanji> <kanji>bell</kanji> is a bell that goes off when you need to be warned about something. This is usually an <vocabulary>alarm bell</vocabulary> or a <vocabulary>fire bell</vocabulary>.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
